about.description: It also provides utility functions to translate NTP fields values to text (mode, leap indicator…). Since it’s pure Python, and only depends on core modules, it should work on any platform with a Python implementation.
about.summary: This module offers a simple interface to query NTP servers from Python.

about.description: It also provides utility functions to translate NTP fields values to text (mode, leap indicator…). Since it’s pure Python, and only depends on core modules, it should work on any platform with a Python implementation.
about.summary: This module offers a simple interface to query NTP servers from Python.

name: ntplib
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "ntplib" %}
{% set version = "0.4.0" %}
{% set sha256 = "899d8fb5f8c2555213aea95efca02934c7343df6ace9d7628a5176b176906267" %}
{% set python_min = "3.6" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 1
  script: python -m pip install --no-deps --ignore-installed  .
  noarch: python

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}

test:
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}
  imports:
    - ntplib

about:
  home: https://pypi.org/project/ntplib/
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  license_family: MIT
  summary: This module offers a simple interface to query NTP servers from Python.
  description: |
    It also provides utility functions to translate NTP fields values to text (mode, leap indicator…). Since it’s pure Python, and only depends on core modules, it should work on any platform with a Python implementation.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - iparask
